title: What age is too late to become a master mathematician? - Quora

response.answer_text: A favorite example of mine is Paul Erdos. It’s true that he didn’t wait to become a “master mathematician” until he was older, but he continued to demonstrate an ability to make advances in mathematics until the day he died, at age 83. If you have what ever it takes to be a master mathematician, or can develop it, it’s yours to do with as you wish. And as to whether you have or can develop it, there is simply no way to know unless you try. If you love math, try.
